altTitles.en: 独占欲 (日向せいりょう)

description.en:
1. Monopolistic Desire  
The story of the new high school teacher, Ichikura, and the younger brother of his ex-lover, Oda.  
Although an excellent student and member of the student council, Oda threatens Ichikura with the relationship between him and his elder brother. Is this the beginning of debauchery in the name of learning?  
  
2. We Would Like to Serve You  
Kawamura Tomoki is a 19-year-old aspiring chef. One night, he's rushing out of his apartment and bangs salaryman Seno Hino with his door, knocking him out. When Tomoki finds out Seno faint sometimes from not eating properly, how can he resist feeding the skinny guy? And you know what they say… the way to a man's heart is through his stomach~  
  
3 & 4. Without Harboring!  
Shin's "nephew" (not biological) Yuuto needs a place to stay after his apartment burned down. Shin remembers when Yuuto used to cling to him all the time - and sees how much the younger boy changed. Their relationship becomes strained when Shin gets drunk and Yuuto gets tempted.  
  
5. It Will Convey to You Once More  
Doujima Hiroshi has a bad habit… when he falls in love with someone, he doesn't consider the consequences. He finds himself falling for his superior Nomura Souichi, a cold, efficient, and ~sexy~ man. The two salarymen go drinking, and secrets start to spill…  
  
6. Monopolistic Desire Extra  
Extra about chapter one. Just a continuation of the story.
